Pensacola.American National Bank Building (Pensaco: The American National Bank Building (also known as the Florida National Bank Building, the Seville Tower or Empire Building) at 226 South Palafox Street in Pensacola, Florida, United States is a historic bank. On November 17, 1978, it was added to the U.S. National Register of Historic Places. It was designed by New York architect J. E. R. Carpenter.
